sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Meridian Ranch is a master-planned community on 2600 acres in Peyton, Colorado. Homes built by several respected builders sit on quarter acre to 2 acre lots many with expansive Peak and Rocky Mountain views. District 49 schools serve this area. Residents enjoy the award-winning Antler Creek Golf Course and 30,000 sq ft Rec Center with swimming pool, parks and miles of hiking/biking trails.
